Job Description

Job #: 880917

Data Analyst

Duties and Responsibilities
  • Analyze data using statistical methods.
  • Perform testing and validation of data sets.
  • Document structures and types of business data.

    Requirements and Qualifications
  • Up to 3 years of experience in a data analyst or relevant role.
  • Strong analytical capabilities.
  • Expert with Microsoft Excel and various business intelligence and analytical tools.
  • Experience with Tableau and/or Microsoft Power BI required.

    If interested in applying, please send resume to
